step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your hands clasped comfortably in your lap, maintaining an upright posture.
You're raising your hands well. Try to keep your elbows a bit closer together as you bring them towards your forehead.
Nicely done spreading your elbows wide behind your head. Focus on keeping your head upright and avoid pulling forward.
Good hold! You maintained the position effectively. Remember to breathe deeply during the hold.
Smooth reversal. You returned to the starting position well. Keep the motion controlled.
Second rep, starting strong! Hands clasped in your lap, posture tall.
You're bringing your hands up nicely. Focus on keeping those elbows in as you move towards your forehead.
Excellent spread of the elbows behind your head! Remember the tip to keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward.
Good hold for the second rep. You're maintaining good form and control.
Great job reversing the motion smoothly. You completed the second rep with good control.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Remember to keep your elbows close when raising your hands and spread them wide behind your head. Maintain an upright posture throughout and avoid pulling forward to maximize the stretch.
